Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Br1 = fun (m : fmap) (x x' : dart) => if succ_dec m zero x then if succ_dec m zero x' then B (L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x)) zero x' else B m zero x else B m zero x' : fmap -> dart -> dart -> fmap
expe = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => MA0.expo m z t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
expe_B_expe : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expe (B m zero x) z t -> expe m z t
expe_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let m0 := L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x) in expe m0 z t < -> expe m z t
expe_B_i : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> let t := Iter (MA0.f (B m zero x)) i z in expe m z t
MA0.expo_symm : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t -> MA0.expo m t z
MA0.expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t -> exd m t
nopred_expe_L_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (k : dim) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m k x y) -> exd m z -> ~ pred m zero z -> let t := Iter (cA m zero) i z in (i < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat -> expe (L m k x y) z t
MA0.expo_expo1 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t < -> MA0.expo1 m z t
expe_top : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t -> top m zero z = top m zero t
MA0.expo_eq_exds_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.expo m z t < -> exds (MA0.Iter_orb m z) t
expe_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t -> bottom m zero z = bottom m zero t
expf_symm : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), expf m z t -> expf m t z
MA0.expo_trans : forall (m : fmap) (z t u : dart), MA0.expo m z t -> MA0.expo m t u -> MA0.expo m z u
MA0.between_expo : forall (m : fmap) (z v t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.between m z v t -> MA0.expo m z v /\ MA0.expo m z t
betweene_dec1 : forall (m : fmap) (z v t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m v -> betweene m z v t \/ ~ betweene m z v t
expf_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> expf (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x)) z t < -> expf m z t
expf_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> expf (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) z t < -> expf m z t
planar_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> x <> x' -> planar (Br1 m x x')
inv_hmap_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> inv_hmap (Br1 m x x')
not_succ_Br1_snd : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ (Br1 m x x') zero x'
eqc_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x) in eqc m0 z t < -> eqc m z t
cA1_1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 (Br1 m x x') one z = cA_1 m one z
cA1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA (Br1 m x x') one z = cA m one z
expe_top_z : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expe m z (top m zero z)
eqc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m z t < -> eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t
not_succ_Br1_fst : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ (Br1 m x x') zero x

MA0.ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem m z in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}

cA0_1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cA_1 (Br1 m x x') zero z = (if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then x' else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x') z then x else cA_1 m zero z)
cF_1_Br1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cF_1 (Br1 m x x') z = (if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m one x) z then cA m zero x' else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m one x') z then cA m zero x else cF_1 m z)
cF_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cF (Br1 m x x') z = (if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then cA_1 m one x' else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x') z then cA_1 m one x else cF m z)
expe_top_A : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero z -> expe m (top m zero z) (A m zero z)
MA0.expo_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> {MA0.expo m z t} + {~ MA0.expo m z t}
double_link = fun (m : fmap) (x x' : dart) => x <> x' /\ expe m x x' : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
cA0_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cA (Br1 m x x') zero z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then cA m zero x' else if eq_dart_dec x' z then cA m zero x else cA m zero z)
exd_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (Br1 m x x') z
cF_1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cF_1 (Br1 m x x') z = (if eq_dart_dec x (cA m one z) then cA m zero x' else if eq_dart_dec x' (cA m one z) then cA m zero x else cF_1 m z)
disconnect_planar_criterion_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> double_link m x x' -> let y := cA m zero x in let y' := cA m zero x' in expf m y y' < -> ~ eqc (Br1 m x x') x' y'
betweene = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => MA0.between m z v t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
disconnect_planar_criterion_Br1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> double_link m x x' -> let y := cA m zero x in let y' := cA m zero x' in expf m y y' < -> ~ eqc (Br1 m x x') x y

```  
intros m x x' z t Hmap Hexpe.
